languages.text: "Мои псайкерские способности позволяют влиять на человеческое тело. Один из самых эффективных инструментов для воздействия на тех, кто противится дознанию. Но вот насчет желания его использовать — пожалуй, тут ты погорячил{mf|ся|ась}".

"My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."
languages.original_text: "Мои псайкерские способности позволяют влиять на человеческое тело. Один из самых эффективных инструментов для воздействия на тех, кто противится дознанию. Но вот насчет желания его использовать — пожалуй, тут ты погорячил{mf|ся|ась}".

traits.locale_text: "My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

"My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

"My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

"My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

languages.text: “我可以用灵能来影响人类的躯体。对于那些不配合审判，打算反抗的人而言，这是对付他们最有效的工具之一。但如果你是在暗示我‘想要’使用这种能力的话，我觉得你有点想得太多了。”
languages.original_text: "My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

traits.locale_text: “我可以用灵能来影响人类的躯体。对于那些不配合审判，打算反抗的人而言，这是对付他们最有效的工具之一。但如果你是在暗示我‘想要’使用这种能力的话，我觉得你有点想得太多了。”

languages.text: «Mis habilidades psíquicas me permiten afectar al cuerpo humano. Es una de las herramientas más eficaces que poseo contra los individuos que resisten el interrogatorio. Pero si está insinuando que "quiero" usarlas, creo que se está adelantando».
languages.original_text: "My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Mis habilidades psíquicas me permiten afectar al cuerpo humano. Es una de las herramientas más eficaces que poseo contra los individuos que resisten el interrogatorio. Pero si está insinuando que "quiero" usarlas, creo que se está adelantando».

languages.text: 「私の異能者としえの能力は、人体に影響を与えることができる。尋問に抵抗する人間に対して使うには、最も効果的なツールのひとつだ。だが、私がそれを『使いたい』と思わせたいというのなら…少し先走りすぎだろう」
languages.original_text: "My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「私の異能者としえの能力は、人体に影響を与えることができる。尋問に抵抗する人間に対して使うには、最も効果的なツールのひとつだ。だが、私がそれを『使いたい』と思わせたいというのなら…少し先走りすぎだろう」

languages.text: "Meine Psioniker-Fähigkeiten erlauben mir den Zugriff auf den menschlichen Körper. Sie sind eines der effektivsten Werkzeuge gegen Individuen, die sich der Befragung widersetzen. Aber falls Ihr damit andeutet, dass ich sie einsetzen 'will' – wäre das vorschnell."
languages.original_text: "My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Psioniker-Fähigkeiten erlauben mir den Zugriff auf den menschlichen Körper. Sie sind eines der effektivsten Werkzeuge gegen Individuen, die sich der Befragung widersetzen. Aber falls Ihr damit andeutet, dass ich sie einsetzen 'will' – wäre das vorschnell."

languages.text: « Mes aptitudes de psyker me permettent de manipuler le corps humain. C'est d'ailleurs l'un des outils les plus efficaces contre les individus qui résistent aux interrogatoires. Toutefois, si vous suggérez que je "veux" m'en servir, sachez que vous vous méprenez. »
languages.original_text: "My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Mes aptitudes de psyker me permettent de manipuler le corps humain. C'est d'ailleurs l'un des outils les plus efficaces contre les individus qui résistent aux interrogatoires. Toutefois, si vous suggérez que je "veux" m'en servir, sachez que vous vous méprenez. »

languages.text: "Ruhsezer kabiliyetlerim, insan vücuduna tesir edebilmemi sağlıyor. Sorgulanmaya direnen bireylere karşı en etkili araçlardandır. Fakat bu aracı kullanmak 'istediğimi' ima ediyorsan biraz çizmeyi aştığını söylemeliyim."
languages.original_text: "My psyker abilities allow me to affect the human body. It is one of the most effective tools to use against individuals who resist questioning. But if you're suggesting that I 'want' to use it — I think you are getting a little ahead of yourself."

traits.locale_text: “Ruhsezer kabiliyetlerim, insan vücuduna tesir edebilmemi sağlıyor. Sorgulanmaya direnen bireylere karşı en etkili araçlardandır. Fakat bu aracı kullanmak 'istediğimi’ ima ediyorsan biraz çizmeyi aştığını söylemeliyim.”
